com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.role

Class RoleHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.role.RoleHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler

    public class RoleHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Handler
    Handles all roles for this server. The idea of roles is that server admins don't need to deal with permissions because all permissions are organized under roles by default

      • registerPermission

        @Nonnull
public Permission registerPermission(@Nonnull
                                              java.lang.String perm,
                                              @Nonnull
                                              java.lang.String role)
        Tries to register a new permission object. will return existing one instead of duplicating.
        Parameters:
        perm - the perm string
        role - the role name
        Returns:
        the permission object that belongs to the given input
        Throws:
        NoSuchRoleException - when a role is not registered
